data.title: Westfield Sports Cars
data.meta_description: We are delighted to launch the new Westfield Sports Cars company from Bicester, deep within Motorsport Valley. Dedicated to preserving the 30 year heritage of the company and further developing the models for the 2020's.
data.text:
A new era for Westfield

We are delighted to launch the new Westfield Sports Cars company from Bicester, deep within Motorsport Valley. We are dedicated to preserving the 30 year heritage of the company and further developing the models for the 2020s.

An all new range of Westfield Sports models are currently being developed and will be available in 2024.

Current Cars

Beautifully engineered British sports cars you can build at home from our comprehensive kits

These 'Final Edition' cars are the best specified Westfield kits ever available and are a limited offer

Single Donor Vehicle FE

Build your very own Westfield from a Mazda MX5 using our highly developed

single donor vehicle kit.

ZETEC Sport FE

The ZETEC Sport Final Edition is a complete new Westfield that you can build at home.

Parts Shop - Now Open

Our online parts shop is now open for business for UK deliveries. International orders can still be taken, but need to be processed manually whilst we set up shipping.

SHOP!

Parts Department

All the spare parts and upgrade packages you need to keep your Westfield Sport or XI on the road. You can buy direct through our web shop or call parts for help and advice on 01869 221154

More DEtails

After Sales

Westfield Chesil Ltd has accelerated the provision of an in-house after sales, IVA support, service and repair team.

We are now open to discuss your requirements and schedule work. Click below for more information on how we can help you.

More Details

About us

Westfield Chesil Ltd is a family owned company that bought the assets and rights to build all Westfield and Chesil sports cars in September 2022. Having relocated the businesses to Bicester, Oxfordshire we are now open for vehicle and parts sales.

Our new team is looking forward to helping you build the British sports car of your dreams.

Pricing

All prices include UK VAT @ 20%
